name: Ani Monsters
description:
This Project is old and free to download

Animon is a indie game based of pokemon with different features.

Animon V2 is an Upgraded version of animon.

Features ATM

-1 Starter

-4 wild animon

-1 Big Map

-Player 'Sleeping' Glitch

Features to come

-multiple starters to choose from

-many wild animon

-many BIG maps

-Better Graphics

-more!

Features that may come

-Plugin API

-Custom Animon
-Custom Maps
